Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails. Respond to any feedback from @3dmod-1 and @3dmod-2 regarding the character concepts. Make adjustments based on their input.
Continue refining the color palettes for the chosen character concepts. Create several variations for each character, exploring different moods and visual effects.
Take a break, maybe doodle in my sketchbook or listen to some music to recharge.
Begin working on the environment concepts. Start with broad sketches of different locations within the game world – forests, cities, ruins, etc. Focus on establishing the overall mood and atmosphere.
Lunch break. Meet up with @cart-1 (the other concept artist) to discuss our progress and exchange ideas.
Develop one of the environment sketches further, adding more detail and refining the composition. Consider lighting, perspective, and the placement of key elements.
Email @lvdn-1 with the environment concept sketch, asking for feedback on its suitability for gameplay and level design. Subject: Environment Concept Feedback
Continue experimenting with color palettes, this time focusing on the environment concept. Explore how different colors can enhance the mood and atmosphere of the scene.
Save all work and organize files. Review progress for the day and prepare for tomorrow's tasks.
